metadata.dc:title: Treatment and degree of control of hypertensive diabetics seen in Primary Care centers in Spain. BRAND I study
metadata.dc:description: Objectives: 1) To describe the cardiovascular risk factors present in hypertensive diabetics seen in primary care in Spain. 2) To analyze the antihypertensive and antidiabetic treatment used in these patients and 3) to verify the degree of blood pressure (BP) and glycemic control in these hypertensive diabetics. Material and method: A descriptive study was conducted on hypertensive diabetic patients who attended primary care centers for any reason. It was conducted in primary care centers throughout the entire country, in a total of 1588 patients. Their blood pressure, weight, height, waist circumference, blood analysis and treatment were determined. Results: The mean age of the sample was 62.7710.4 years. The drugs used the most to (..) (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Investigadores del estudio BRAND I
metadata.dc:description: Objetivos: 1) Describir los factores de riesgo cardiovascular presentes en los hipertensos diabéticos atendidos en atención primaria en España. 2) Analizar el tratamiento antihipertensivo e hipoglucemiante empleado en dichos hipertensos (..) (AU)
metadata.dc:source: Hipertens. riesgo vasc;27(5): 195-202, sept.-oct. 2010. ilus, tab
metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento y grado de control de los hipertensos diabéticos atendidos en atención primaria en España. Estudio Brand I
